en_us: Get hit by a Phantom Scarecrow
Set up Scarecrows that shoot homing rockets at Phantoms!
Placing a skull or zombie head on an armour stand and equipping it with a cursed chestplate will transform it into a phantom scarecrow.
Phantom scarecrows will shoot fireworks at phantoms above them.\n\nPhantoms shot by these projectiles will instantly die, but if the firework projectile hits a block, it will explode.
